org.spf4j.os

Class OperatingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.os.OperatingSystem

  • public final class OperatingSystem
extends Object
    Utility to wrap access to JDK specific Operating system Mbean attributes.
    Author:
    Zoltan Farkas

      • forkExec

        public static <T,E> ProcessResponse<T,E> forkExec(String[] command,
                                                  ProcessHandler<T,E> handler,
                                                  long timeoutMillis,
                                                  long terminationTimeoutMillis)
                                           throws IOException,
                                                  InterruptedException,
                                                  ExecutionException,
                                                  TimeoutException
        Process execution utility.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type the stdout is reduced to.
        E - type stderr is reduced to.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to execute.
        handler - handler for child stdin, stdout and stderr. stdout and stderr handling will be done in 2 threads from the DefaultExecutor thread pool. while stdin handling will execute in the current thread.
        timeoutMillis - time to wait for the process to execute.
        terminationTimeoutMillis - this is the timeout used when trying to terminate the process gracefully.
        Returns:
        the response (respCode, stdout reduction, stderr reduction)
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException
        TimeoutException - when timeout happens.

      • forkExec

        @CheckReturnValue
public static String forkExec(String[] command,
                                                long timeoutMillis)
                                         throws IOException,
                                                InterruptedException,
                                                ExecutionException,
                                                TimeoutException
